heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers likely early in the northern Greens and Champlain Valley, with another trace to 2 inches; otherwise scattered overnight, mainly in the northern mountains, with another trace to an inch. Lows from zero to 10 above in the north, low to mid teens in the south. West winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Partly to mostly sunny. Scattered early snow showers northeast. Valley highs from the upper teens to mid 20s south and in the Champlain Valley, mid teens to around 20 elsewhere north. West winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mainly clear early, then periods of clouds developing. A few snow showers, mostly west of the Green Mountains. Lows in the teens north, a few single digits northeast, and around 20 in the south. Winds becoming light and variable east of the Green Mountains, becoming south 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens.
